subtitleNullable: Images and labels for 10 types of common pets for object detection
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains pictures of **dogs, cats, fish, birds, rabbits, hamsters, guinea pigs, snakes, lizards, turtles, and horses** taken from larger datasets that you can find in the provenance section. Each picture has a corresponding TXT file containing bounding box labels for each type of animal in each image, all created in [makesense.ai](https://www.makesense.ai/) by yours truly. XML files were included in a previous version.

The data is split into a training dataset and a testing dataset. The training dataset contains 100 randomly selected images of each type of pet, with 1,000 images total. The testing dataset only contains 20 images of each type of pet with 200 images total. Feel free to change these as you see fit.

The notebook is attached, or you can view the barely functional website [here](https://petdetector.anvil.app/)!

Please enjoy the cute animals!
title: Images of Common Pets
subtitle: Images and labels for 10 types of common pets for object detection
description:
This dataset contains pictures of **dogs, cats, fish, birds, rabbits, hamsters, guinea pigs, snakes, lizards, turtles, and horses** taken from larger datasets that you can find in the provenance section. Each picture has a corresponding TXT file containing bounding box labels for each type of animal in each image, all created in [makesense.ai](https://www.makesense.ai/) by yours truly. XML files were included in a previous version.

The data is split into a training dataset and a testing dataset. The training dataset contains 100 randomly selected images of each type of pet, with 1,000 images total. The testing dataset only contains 20 images of each type of pet with 200 images total. Feel free to change these as you see fit.

The notebook is attached, or you can view the barely functional website [here](https://petdetector.anvil.app/)!
